content.question: The Open Door policy of the early twentieth century called for

choices.label: the continuation of the Monroe Doctrine in the Western Hemisphere
the opening of United States markets to foreign goods
the elimination of passports for international travel
unlimited European immigration into the United States
open access to China for American investment and commercial interests

content.answer: open access to China for American investment and commercial interests

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
